content: Back in NYC and the city's got me buzzing with ideas again. Got laid off, but you know what? It's actually a blessing in disguise. Diving into coding an AI buddy, thinking of calling it Xander. Let's get deep into this machine learning stuff, focusing on how to make some market prediction magic
raw_content: Back in NYC, the city's electric buzz is already sparking ideas. I've lost my job, but I'm turning this into an opportunity. I've started coding an AI companion, tentatively naming it Xander. It's time to dive deep into machine learning, focusing on reinforcement learning for market prediction.
